title: 希望發一個已有Friend Mod 朋友 的MC.............
author: dreamsun
txt_content:
本帖最后由 dreamsun 于 2011-6-14 21:31 编辑 

我試了數次都不行..........                   
明明已經跟着指引做..............

所以我想請大家幫幫忙............
因為一個人玩 MC 很怕.............          
看到這個MOD就很高興........
但是卻不行........

請大家幫幫忙吧  >.<                 (對不起，人家是香港人，不懂得寫 簡体字 ......... 請見諒...........)

replies.author: aizuo
replies.txt_content:
MODLOADER NEEDED!
1. Add files from "Add to jar" To the minecraft.jar.
2. Add folder "mod_Friend" to folder ".minecraft" (the one /bin is in!).
3. Open folder "mod_Friend" (the one in .minecraft) and then edit "FriendConfig.txt" to your liking.
If you do not change the config your friend will be Minecraft's own: Steve.
4. Be sure to add the texture to the minecraft.jar(best putting it in the /mobs folder inside minecraft.jar).
